p:
The diagram below (Module Dependencies) depicts the relationships between the various modules composing Mevenide. mevenide-master is the top-level project that triggers the build. It delegates to the MEP plugin the creation of the Eclipse plugin artifact (feature archive, update site archive and the various plugins archive distribution).
mevenide-core, goals-grabber and mevenide-ui-eclipse are the three main subprojects of Mevenide. The mevenide-ui-eclipse module relies on both the core and grabber modules.
Figure 1Module Dependencies
